scripts.setup:client: cd client && pnpm install && node --loader ts-node/esm ../copy-env.mts ./
scripts.setup:server: cd server && pnpm install && node --loader ts-node/esm ../copy-env.mts ./
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm setup:client && pnpm setup:server
scripts.dev: pnpm concurrently "cd server && pnpm develop" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd client && pnpm dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
